name: patient_id
description: Unique patient identifier

name: diagnosis_chronic_intractable_pain
description: Patient must have chronic intractable pain for Spinal Cord Stimulator (SCS) coverage consideration

name: pain_type_neuropathic
description: Indicates if the pain is neuropathic, for which SCS is best suited

name: pain_type_nociceptive_severe_intractable
description: Indicates if the pain is nociceptive severe, intractable, for which SCS may have limited value

name: scs_trial_required
description: A short trial with percutaneous neurostimulator electrode(s) is required to assess suitability for permanent implantation

name: scs_effective_trial_prerequisite
description: Performance and documentation of an effective trial is a prerequisite for permanent nerve stimulation implantation

name: scs_replacement_trial_not_needed
description: A new trial is not needed for SCS replacement due to battery change, malfunction, or end of stimulator life

name: conservative_therapy_attempted
description: More conservative attempts (e.g., medications, physical therapy, psychological therapy, or other modalities) must have been tried before SCS therapy

name: multidisciplinary_team_evaluation_required
description: Careful screening, evaluation, and diagnosis by a multidisciplinary team is required prior to implantation

name: psychological_evaluation_required
description: Psychological evaluation is required as part of the multidisciplinary team screening prior to implantation

name: physical_evaluation_required
description: Physical evaluation is required as part of the multidisciplinary team screening prior to implantation

name: active_substance_abuse_issues_present
description: Patient must not have active substance abuse issues

name: patient_education_required
description: Patient must undergo proper education, discussion, and disclosure of SCS therapy risks and benefits

name: temporary_neurostimulator_placement_setting
description: The setting for temporary neurostimulator trial (ASC, outpatient hospital, or office with specific requirements)

name: permanent_neurostimulator_placement_setting
description: The setting for permanent neurostimulator implantation (ASC or hospital)

name: physician_board_certification_or_privileges_required
description: Physicians performing SCS trials in an office setting must have hospital/ASC privileges or be subspecialty boarded in Pain Medicine by the American Board of Anesthesiology

name: trial_success_pain_reduction_percentage
description: A successful SCS trial requires at least a 50% reduction of target pain

name: trial_success_analgesic_reduction_percentage
description: A successful SCS trial requires at least a 50% reduction of analgesic medications

name: trial_success_functional_improvement
description: A successful SCS trial requires some element of functional improvement

name: physician_trial_to_implant_ratio_threshold
description: Physicians with a trial to permanent implant ratio less than 50% will be subject to post-payment review

name: scs_leads_maximum
description: Maximum of 2 leads reimbursed for SCS placement per patient per lifetime

name: scs_contacts_maximum
description: Maximum of 16 contacts reimbursed for SCS placement per patient per lifetime

name: scs_trials_maximum_per_region_per_patient_lifetime
description: Maximum of 2 SCS trials reimbursed per anatomic spinal region per patient per lifetime

name: repeat_scs_trial_exception
description: Repeat SCS trial is not appropriate unless there are extenuating circumstances that led to initial trial failure

name: diagnosis_code_ICD10
description: ICD-10-CM codes including Z45.42 (Encounter for adjustment and management of neurostimulator); M48.061, M48.062 (replaced M48.06); M48.06 (deleted); G57.73, T85.113A, T85.113D, T85.113S, T85.123A, T85.123D, T85.123S, T85.193A, T85.193D, T85.193S (added 10/1/2016); T85.112A, T85.112D, T85.112S, T85.122A, T85.122D, T85.122S, T85.192A, T85.192D, T85.192S (changed descriptors 10/1/2016)

name: procedure_code_CPT
description: CPT codes 63661, 63662, 63688, 95970, 95971, 95972 related to spinal cord stimulator procedures (removed from this LCD's diagnostic criteria effective 10/1/2017)

name: procedure_code_HCPCS
description: HCPCS code L8680 (deleted from Group 2 effective 10/1/2016)
